The tragedy of Hamlet, Prince of Denmark as it is now acted at His Highness the Duke of York's Theatre / by William Shakespeare. D'Avenant, William, Sir, 1606-1668. Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. Hamlet.
[4], 88 p.
Printed by Andr. Clark for J. Martyn and H. Herringman ..., London : 1676.
Alterations and additions by Sir William D'Avenant. Cf. Branam, G.C. Eighteenth-century adaptations of Shakespearean tragedy. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
